Transformative experiences, shifting values and the modular mind

inspired by rationally speaking 183 with L.A. Paul. combining the idea of the modular mind and semicoherent rationality.

Rational agents should oppose changes in their values. Should nonrational agents, or groups of rational agents? What about groups of rational agents who gain and lose members?

Do I contradict myself? Very well, then I contradict myself, I am large, I contain multitudes.

Walt Whitman A song of myself
